translation: I'd like to make offerings to the Big Dipper, the stars, and the form of my original life spirit.

source_sentence: 將長是生益壽無諸橫禍。
translation: It will give him long life, benefit his life span, and prevent any untoward disasters.
The spirit will be at peace.
The original spirit will be at ease.
Xiangnian Ben■ drives them away to a distant place.
He burns money again and joins his palms in making offerings.
┌○ Śāriputra (born at noon)

source_sentence: ○─○武曲星賓大東(巳未生人屬云云)　　└○廉貞星不灌子(辰申生人)　　　└○文曲星微慧子(卯酉生人)　　　　├○祿存星祿會(寅戌生人)　　┌─┴○巨門星貞文子(亥丑生人)　　○貪狼星司希子(子生人)凡祿命書云云。
translation: ○○ Wuqu Star Bin Dadong (born in the year Śāriputra) └○ Lianzhen Star Buhuizi (born in the year Śāriputra) └○ Wenqu Star Weihuizi (born in the year Ō) ├○ Rucun Star Ruchui (born in the year Śubhū) ┌┴○ Juomen Star Zhenwenzi (born in the year Ōshū) ○ Greedy Wolf Star Si Xizi (born in the year Śubhū) Where the book of Rucun is written, it's like this.
He belongs to the class of people who are born under the star Bajra.

source_sentence: 日食一升餘命八十歲　男女午年字大京子。
translation: He eats one liter of food each day, and his remaining life is 80 years old.
He belongs to the star Wuzu.

source_sentence: 日食一石餘命八十五歲　巳未年男女字大東子。
translation: He eats a stone's worth of food each day and lives to be 85 years old.
He's a Lianzheng Xing person.

source_sentence: 日食一升餘命八十歲　辰申年男女字術不隣子。
translation: He eats a liter of food in the sun and has a life of 80 years. In the year Śānshen, he'll be a man and woman whose letters are not related to each other.
He's a native of the star Wenqu.

source_sentence: 日食四升餘命九十歲　卯酉年男女字微慧字。
translation: He eats four liters of sunlight and has a remaining life of 90 years. In the year Mao You, he's a man and woman named Weixinzi.
He belongs to the star Rucun.

source_sentence: 日食五升餘命八十歲　寅戌年男女字祿存會子。
translation: In the year of the eclipse of the sun, his life will be 80 years old for the remaining five liters. In the year of the year of the crocodile, the male and female characters Rucun will meet the son.
He belongs to the group of people with the star Juomen.

source_sentence: 日食八升餘命八十歲　丑亥年男女字貞文子。
translation: In the year of the eclipse of the sun, his life will be 80 years old for the remainder of his life. In the year of the ugly year and the year of the holy year, his male and female characters will be Zhenyan Wenzi.
He's a Cūḷapanthaka.

source_sentence: 日食二升餘命六十五歲　子年男女字司希神子。
translation: In the year of the eclipse of the sun, he'll have a residual life of 65 years. In the year of the son, the man and woman will have the Sanskrit letter Sishenzi.

source_sentence: 一切如來說破一切宿曜障吉祥真言
translation: "The Tathāgata teaches us the auspicious saying to break through all the hindrances of constellations and celestial bodies.

source_sentence: 唵薩縛諾剎怛羅(二合)三磨曳室哩曳扇底迦俱嚕娑婆(二合)賀男忌天羅女忌地網欲知衰禍但在行年所犯無不知也　夫人行年吉少凶多乍可知而迴避不可坐受其災云若莫日　■■。
translation: Om svānoza tantra (2) samma hari hari fandi ka kuru svā (2) he male contravention of the heavenly hell female contravention of the earthly net want to know about misfortune but in the year of practice there is nothing to know about the transgressions of the lady in the year of practice auspicious and less auspicious and much more likely to be known and avoided at first not to sit and suffer its calamities as Yunruo Mozh ■■.
Brahmā's Fire Mantra: A Commentary

source_sentence: 敬白大梵天王帝釋天王。
translation: "Venerate the king of Brahmā, the king of Indra, and the king of Indra.
"Yama, the son of Yama, the great deity of the five destinies.
Taishan Fujun, the director of livelihood and emolument.
The twelve palace deities are seven yao and nine lords.
The twenty-eight constellations are the Yakṣa and Yakṣa women.

source_sentence: 毘舍遮毘舍支步多那天等。
translation: Vaiśācī, Vaiśācī, Pūtanian, and so forth.

source_sentence: 殊別當所鎮守護法善神。
translation: They are distinctive, local guardians of the Dharma and good spirits.

source_sentence: 若家內守宅諸大小神等。
translation: If they guard the house inside the home, the large and small gods and so forth.

source_sentence: 并三千大千世界不可說不可說微塵剎土六道四生類。
translation: There are also the three thousand great one-thousand worlds, the ineffable and ineffable minutest of bases, the six destinies, and the four kinds of birth.
I'd like you to set up an offering to the spirits, complete with offerings.
Set up a sacred offering, with no obscuration.
Those of you who have great aspirations can know their minds, so forth.

source_sentence: 次勸請　向東方合掌　已上畢。
translation: Next, he asks them to bow their palms together in the east after the above.
(It's written on a paper sleeve in the table below. I'll record it here.)

source_sentence: 一(羅睺大惡)二(土少惡)三(水中吉)四(金中吉)五(日大吉)六(火少惡)七(計大吉)八(月中吉)九(木大吉)。
translation: 1 (Rāhu is very bad), 2 (Earth is less bad), 3 (Water is good), 4 (Gold is good), 5 (Sun is good), 6 (Fire is less bad), 7 (Calculation is good), 8 (Moon is good), and 9 (Wood is good).

source_sentence: 名一切少天呪法(以右手中指直。
translation: The name of the spell is Sarvâstivāda (Use the middle finger of your right hand to straighten.
He makes a fist with the other fingers.
Do the same with the left hand.
He brings his second hand together at the wrist and goes eight inches from his heart and chest.
The middle finger of the right hand is slightly flexed.
He brings his left middle finger into and out of his mouth.
He moves it so that it's wrathful.")
A General Dhāraṇī for the Gods

source_sentence: 唵路迦　迦路野曳　娑婆賀
translation: (Skt. om lokâ karaṇḍa) svāhā
Written in the eighth month of the fifth year of Wenzhi's reign.
He took four copies and checked them.
Xuanzhi Zhengde sansi year.
He wrote it in the Tsugao edition.

source_sentence: 慧旭寬延四年書之宥證　明和四亥年以御室真乘院法務前大僧正宥證大和尚本寫挍。
translation: Hui Xu wrote it in the fourth year of Kanyan, and Yu Zheng wrote it in the fourth year of Minghe with a copy written by the great monk Yu Zheng, former director of the Dharma affairs of the Imperial College of Zenshō.

source_sentence: 智積院動潮　寬政五丑年以右本書之。
translation: Zhigyeon Dōchō Kōshō Gochō 5丑年以右本書之。

source_sentence: 洛北福勝密寺秀陽享和二壬戌冬以件本挍正上木行於普天。
translation: In the winter of the second nonsuch year of the Lopi Fusheng Miji Temple, he took a copy of this book and correctly wrote it on the top of the woodwork in Putian.

source_sentence: 和州豐山長谷寺歡喜院沙門快道記以傳領之本對挍加筆畢　　慈順文政三歲次庚辰季秋朔日以秀陽闍梨去享和三年住豐山之日令密榮傳寫之本於東武湯島根生役寮自手寫挍之了　　　　　　　　　　龍肝(年四十三戒三十七)
translation: In the third year of his life, Jisun Menzō stayed at Hōsan for the third year of his reign, and on the first day of the fall, he had his text handwritten at the Gensho mansion office on Donmu Island in Tomshu.
